mapper.delete: delete from user where user_id = #{user_id} AND user_pw = #{user_pw};
mapper.insert: insert into user(user_id, user_pw, user_name, user_birth, user_email, user_phone, user_gender, user_zip, user_addr1, user_addr2, user_mailSend) values(#{user_id}, #{user_pw}, #{user_name}, #{user_birth}, #{user_email}, #{user_phone}, #{user_gender}, #{user_zip}, #{user_addr1}, #{user_addr2}, #{user_mailSend})
mapper.update: update user set user_pw=#{user_pw}, user_birth=#{user_birth}, user_email=#{user_email}, user_phone=#{user_phone}, user_gender=#{user_gender}, user_zip=#{user_zip}, user_addr1=#{user_addr1}, user_addr2=#{user_addr2}, user_mailSend=#{user_mailSend} where user_id=#{user_id}
